typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		COMMISSION_PCT as double,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID7 as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_ID8 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'Source_File_path',
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmpDeptSCR
EmpDeptSCR split(equals(DEPARTMENT_NAME,'IT'),
	equals(DEPARTMENT_NAME,'Executive'),
	equals(DEPARTMENT_NAME, 'Purchasing'),
	equals(DEPARTMENT_NAME, 'Shipping'),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CondlSplitondep@(IT, Executive, Purchasing, Shipping, Sales)
CondlSplitondep@IT derive(COMMISSION_PCT = iifNull(COMMISSION_PCT, 10)) ~> CommNVLReplace
CommNVLReplace sink(input(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ITEmployee_Details.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		HIRE_DATE,
		SALARY,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME,
		COMMISSION_PCT
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ITEmpRecords
CondlSplitondep@Executive sink(input(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ExecuteEmp_detail.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		HIRE_DATE,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExecuteEmpDetails
CondlSplitondep@Purchasing sink(input(

		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

		LAST_NAME,

		SALARY,

		DEPARTMENT_NAME
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PurchaseEmpdetails
CondlSplitondep@Shipping sink(input(

CondlSplitondep@Sales sink(input(
